name: sshaus
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wss(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, cha))
bodyPretty: ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Haus ∧ c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2)∧ c0 ⊆ c1)→ c1 ∈ Haus)

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wss(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, cha))
-| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c0, ctop))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cha), wf1(cres(cid, c2), c2, c2), wcel(cres(cid, c2), co(c1, ccn, c0))), wcel(c1, cha))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Haus ∧ c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2)∧ c0 ⊆ c1)→ c1 ∈ Haus)
⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0
⊣ (c0 ∈ Haus → c0 ∈ Top)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ Haus ∧((= |` c2): c2 ↣ c2)∧(= |` c2)∈(c1[Cn]c0))→ c1 ∈ Haus)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wss(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, cha))
-| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c0, ctop))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cha), wf1(cres(cid, c2), c2, c2), wcel(cres(cid, c2), co(c1, ccn, c0))), wcel(c1, cha))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Haus ∧ c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2)∧ c0 ⊆ c1)→ c1 ∈ Haus)
⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0
⊣ (c0 ∈ Haus → c0 ∈ Top)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ Haus ∧((= |` c2): c2 ↣ c2)∧(= |` c2)∈(c1[Cn]c0))→ c1 ∈ Haus)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wss(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, cha))
-| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cha), wf1(cres(cid, c2), c2, c2), wcel(cres(cid, c2), co(c1, ccn, c0))), wcel(c1, cha))

stmt.origin: cnhaus(c0, cres(cid, c2), c2, c2, c1)

body.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cha), wf1(cres(cid, c2), c2, c2), wcel(cres(cid, c2), co(c1, ccn, c0))), wcel(c1, cha))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wss(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, cha))
-| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Haus ∧ c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2)∧ c0 ⊆ c1)→ c1 ∈ Haus)
⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0

comment: A topology finer than a Hausdorff topology is Hausdorff. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Mar-2015.)
